responses: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
Why was the math book sad? Because it had too many problems.
Why don't seagulls fly over the bay? Because then they'd be called bagels!
What's a skeleton's least favorite room in the house? The living room.
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field.
Why couldn't the bicycle stand up by itself? It was two-tired.
Why couldn't the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!
Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the onion in its skin!
Why did the tomato turn red? Because it was embarrassed to be seen in a fruit salad!
Why don't eggs tell jokes? Because they might crack up!

patterns: what programs do you offer
what programs can I choose from
what programs are there
what plans can I choose from
what offerings do you have
what are the pricing options
responses: At ZyNov, we offer 3 plans for our customers: Pioneer, Explorer, and Adventurer. Each of these plans come with different levels of training, duration, destinations, and costs. For more information, check out each of our programs.

patterns: what are the safety protocols
is space travel safe
do you follow rules and regulations from NASA
what measures do you take to keep things safe
how do you ensure customer safety
what safety precautions do you have in place
tell me about your safety measures
are there any safety regulations for space travel
what safety training do customers receive
do you have safety certifications
what kind of safety equipment do you provide
can you guarantee the safety of customers
what is your approach to safety
what safety guidelines do you follow
do you conduct safety inspections
how do you handle emergencies in space
responses: ZyNov's #1 priority is always customer safety. We make sure to take months to provide our customers with extensive training before they head to space. This includes obtaining a license from the FAA, strength training, buoyancy training, VR training, and training on equipment usage. For more information, check out our safety policies.

patterns: what health risks am I taking

are there any long-term health effects of space travel
what health guidelines do you provide for travelers
do you offer any post-trip health support
what should I do to maintain my health during and after space travel
what medical facilities are available during the trip
what are the potential health risks in space
responses: When taking part in space travel, there are many possible health reprocussions. This can include severe radiation exposure, isolation, and a compromised immune system. However, there are various measures that ZyNov takes to help customers recover and mitigate these effects. More information in the Health and Recover sections here.

responses: ZyNov currently offers 5 spacecrafts: the Boeing CST-100 Starliner, SpaceX Crew Dragon, Russian Soyuz MS, Blue Origin New Shepard, and the Airbus A300 Zero-G. More information about these vehicles can be found in our vehicles section.

responses: ZyNov allows customers 3 different destinations. Customers can go into orbit around the Earth, land on the Moon, or land on Mars. This depends on the program the customer chooses to enroll in. More information can be found here.

responses: ZyNov is a space travel company that aims to make space travel accessible to everyone. We are a team of 2 students that are passionate about space tourism and want to make it a reality. For more information, check out our about page.

responses: The Pioneer program is a 3 month program that includes basic astronaut training, fundamentals of space science, and results in preparation for entry-level positions in the space industry. For more information, check out our Pioneer program.

responses: The Explorer program is a 6 month program that includes intermediate astronaut training, advanced instruction in space science, extensive hands on training, and results in preparation for intermediate-level positions in the space industry. For more information, check out our Explorer program.

responses: The Adventurer program is a 9 month program that includes high intensity astronaut training, comprehensive instruction in all aspects of space, realistic simulations of spaceflight scenarios, extensive physical and mental conditions, and results in preparation for a full time career in the space industry. For more information, check out our Adventurer program.
